venueName: James Island Fire Grill hibachi sushi

pages.text: [Page Title: shopping-basket-smile-1tools-kitchen-serving-dome] Skip to main content Welcome to James Island Fire Grill Hibachi Sushi Restaurant The best Japanese food in Charleston, SC Order Pickup shopping-basket-smile-1 Check Out Our Popular Dishes Gallery Where We Started Our Story James Island Fire Grill Hibachi Sushi Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Japanese cuisine in Charleston, SC. James Island Fire Grill Hibachi Sushi's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for eat-in or take-out meals in the Charleston community. Our restaurant is known for its variety in taste and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service. Always a go-to when we can't be bothered to cook. I really like the texture of the fried rice. Danielle Amazing food! Ordered last week (chicken bowl, shrimp lo mein and telfair roll) it was so good that we ordered some again tonight! Fresh, Fast and very friendly. Kimberly Mascelli Always busy here for a reason. Great food and they work extremely hard to get the orders processed as fast as possible. We appreciate you being here on James Island. JP It’s a great deal to order from here and the food tastes really good. They gave you a really good amount of food for the money. People should try out this place :) Peter Chen Wow, the food here is awesome. The staff was super nice and attentive. Our grilled chicken and steak was better than any other hibachi I’ve been to, just wow! Casey Decided to give it a try, and man was happy we did! The sushi was so fresh and delicious. Everything we ordered was excellent. Our new favorite place on James Island! Jaime Tropauer
